question: assalaam-o-aliakum, if the cow is first stunned, so the cow becomes paralyzed, so its easy to zabiha the cow, is the meat going to be halal or not, fi amanallah
answer:
QUESTION
assalaam-o-aliakum, if the cow is first stunned, so the cow becomes paralyzed, so its easy to zabiha the cow, is the meat going to be halal or not, fi amanallah
ANSWER


Share:
It is Makrooh to stun the animal for the convenience of Zabah. An alternate
method should be adopted for the convenience of Zabah. However, if the
animal is slaughtered after being stunned, and is alive, the Zabah will be
correct and the meat will be Halaal.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
